law.history: Repealed 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 385, sec. 50, effective July 1, 1982. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 460, effective January 2, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2877a-26, 2877a-28.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Matron to attend court -- Be present when female searched.
